studyMetadata.title: Visualization Study
studyMetadata.description: A study to test the empirical effectiveness of truncating the y-axis of bar charts.

config.title: Average Monthly Temperatures for Country S

response.prompt: Select the option that orders the months from lowest to highest average temperature.
options: Jun, Jan, May, Apr, Oct, Nov, Feb, Aug, Dec, Jul, Mar, Sep
Jan, Nov, Feb, Mar, Dec, Sep, May, Apr, Oct, Aug, Jun, Jul
Jul, Jun, Aug, Oct, Apr, May, Sep, Dec, Mar, Feb, Nov, Jan
Oct, Feb, Aug, Apr, Jun, Sep, Jul, Jan, Mar, Dec, May, Nov

correctAnswer.answer: Jan, Nov, Feb, Mar, Dec, Sep, May, Apr, Oct, Aug, Jun, Jul
